places_with_reviews.name: Haryana Tourism- Gauriyya Hotel And Restaurant
address: National Highway 10, Sector 6, Opp: Devilal Park, Ashok Nagar, Old Industrial Area, Bahadurgarh, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text: Nestled near Brigadier Hoshiar Singh metro station, Gauriyya impresses with its charming ambiance and above-average party and wedding offerings. The well-equipped banquet hall and delectable food make it a standout choice ensuring a delightful experience for locals and tourists alike.

On the main road of Bahadurgarh, government maintained resort, with good quality, cleaned banquet hall, open garden, small hall for small functions.
Rooms available are also clean with delux rooms and simple rooms.
Very good place of Government in Bahadurgarh. It is on national highway and adjacent to metro station too. So don't worry about transportation too. Very economical with huge area.

I have been there for marriage function. The food was okay. Even snacks were okay.

It is very near to metro station at walkable distance.
Awesome place for party and marriage purpose, spacy and greenery like wow, on road location is perfect easy to find.

places_with_reviews.name: The Galaxy Resort | Banquet Hall in Bahadurgarh
address: 4 KM Milestone, Main Jhajjar Road, near Bypass Flyover, Bahadurgarh, Nuna Majra, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text: Excellent hotel in Bahadurgarh. Good service, spacious rooms, banquet hall etc. only thing that bothers me a lot is “Required Maintenance of Rooms” . Rest everything is perfect . Location is little bit far away from city. Food is good & Staff is outstanding

Had my sister's marriage here. Rooms look a bit dated but the venue , decoration and banquet was pretty good.....parking space is ample and venue doesn't feel crowded even when lots of guests arrive. Nicely designed and good access from highway
Wrost resort, bad behaviour , staff doesn't cooperate 😑
I visited this place for attending a marrige function. Well maintaine,Large and airy hall. Though toilet was not cleaned. Otherwise it was all good.

💫Wonderful Hospitality & Docile Staff
I could easily commute to Industrial Area as well as the Main City.
Worth the money, very economical !
Thanks for the amazing experience

places_with_reviews.name: Mehar resort
address: Jhajjar Rd, Bahadurgarh, Nuna Majra, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text:
Very luxurious resort, with affordable prices. You can plan your marriages, corporate events and birthday celebrations here.

It is a highly recommended.

Although a little cleaning and maintenance is required for the lake.
But believe me there is no place nearby in any district to visit one like this.
There is a nice restaurant in between of lake where kids enjoy a lot.

It has a very plush hall with ornate looks.
The small eats were ok.
But the main meals were not good. The dinner was not warm.
Service was average

Visited for marriage function
My god what a mesmerizing place. Nice ambience. Location is perfect. Great parking
Space and location is nice but food is the poorest one. Raw material and preparation both are just disgusting. Apna halwai karen.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Beatific Epsilon
address: The Beatific, main, Jhajjar Rd, Bahadurgarh, Nuna Majra, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text: It's spacious and approach is quite good. Although they do not have any parking for vehicles but there is vacant land nearby and they employ a security guard there. Physical facilities are okay but there is huge scope of improvement in the quality of food. Service also needs to be improved.
Best hotel good service good food every thing is superb good behaviour Mr.Ravinder with us on reception no words very nice property I am very satisfied.

Nice place to visit specially their restaurant, their hospitality is superb. Food is awesome. Specially Thanks
Gm Mr.Vinod Thakur ji.
This is nice place... service was good... delicious food... Staff behaviour nice
Food is awesome staff is very cooperative all excellent 👌  specially thanx Mr  vinod thakur ji

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL EMMKAY RESIDENCY
address: Kasaar Rd, Sector 15, Sankhol, Sector 15, Bahadurgarh, Sankhol, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text: Good hotel at Bahadurgarh. Rooms were clean, immaculate with all necessary facilities. Running hot water. Breakfast spread was impressive n tasty. Food in lunch n dinner was excellent, better than most good hotels. I had 2 day stay n all 4 meals were excellent with different menu. Highly recommended, value for money
The food was very nice and tasty. The rooms are big, spacious and clean. The service was nice. Only thing the hot water system doesn't work properly.

The overall experience was quite bad. I stayed with my friends for a night and the behaviour of staff members was very rude. They were not ready to adjust or even listen to what we have to say. Room service was also neglected. There was a big electricity breakdown for the whole night and no steps were taken to either resolve it or even give compensation to customers. In morning as well they were not ready to listen to what we have to say and were very rude. The only thing they care about is money and nothing else.

Overall worst experience.
Rooms are excellent but poor service or you can say no service at all. Uneducated and unprofessional staff.. food is okay okay not upto the mark.. have stayed for more than 3 days.
We attend one party this hotel very nice place

places_with_reviews.name: Royal Celebration
address: Main, Jhajjar Rd, nr. Omaxe Galleria, Sector 14, Bahadurgarh, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text: The Royal Celebration Banquet exceeded all expectations. The opulent decor set a regal tone, complemented by impeccable service. The diverse menu showcased culinary mastery, with each dish a gastronomic delight. The attention to detail, from table settings to entertainment, contributed to an unforgettable experience. A truly royal celebration worth every accolade.
Good clean & green lawn, banquet hall also is spacious.
Food was awesome but golgappe bahot hi gande the.
An excellent banquet hall with quality food at affordable price.

This is a good party point...... Around 10000 people get together possible here. Big lawn and dining area is available. Situated on Jhajjar Road, Bahadurgarh, near bypass road. So, there is no connectivity issue.

Anyone can go for JD Celebration if need a party, wedding or any other ceremony.

places_with_reviews.name: Sampla
address: MWRJ+HH3, Model Town, Bahadurgarh, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text: Good eating place. Reasonably priced. Clean Restrooms.
Good home care service
Very Small Halt For Every Train
nyc
Sweet home

places_with_reviews.name: Hiltan Resort
address: Omaxe City, Bypass, Sector 14, Bahadurgarh, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text:
Basically it’s not a hotel or resort. It’s a convention centre and a party place. They have some rooms for the people to have rest or get ready for the function. Those rooms are rented out.
There is absolutely no reception, no check in check out, no security, no restaurant, no heater, no lobby. You have only a person who stays with a family somewhere around this place.
There was not even a proper lock to our room and every time we had to call someone to open it. Someone was sleeping in the room when we arrived. We insisted to change the bed sheets. Each and every thing we had to insist to get changed. Room was totally dusty and was not cleaned. Bathrooms were dirty. There was no bucket no toiletries and don’t expect it from them. As I told you it’s just a room for people to change and get ready for the function.
Absolutely no Transport facilities. You have to walk around 1.4 kms to find a shop.

Only point is bathroom is almost as big as the room.

Note:- All the reviews I give here is based on my personal experience. I give my reviews honestly and it’s not influenced by any means.
Nice weeding hall in Hiltan Resort
Very good place for wedding anniversary ❣️
Visited here in a marriage reception. Ample space here.
Good place for large gathering.

places_with_reviews.name: Red Huts
address: 873, Delhi - Rohtak Road opp Metro Pillar Number 461 Nehru Park, Nehru Park, Bahadurgarh, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text: Have visited 20 times at least Food quality was best till some time But As the  resturant got bigger quality went worse still  a good palace for family and couples

Verry good and hygienic  food and service
Room small but like it
The palace is located conveniently on Rohtak road near Brigediyar Hoshiyar Singh Metro station The rooms are good and very specious The quality of food was awesome

Hi I am Prashant I was visit some time in bahadurgarh industry I am staying there name is hotel red huts hotel the hotel most liked is food quality is too much bettre then any Street food hotel and restaurant I perefer d to all of please visit and doing some expirince
Best hotel in bahadurgarh city. Staaf behavior is very good. Little issue parking but all service good.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel VC
address: Rohtak Rd, Surya Nagar, Bahadurgarh, Sankhol, Haryana 124507, India

reviews.text: Very good hotel nd  good for business person

It's old hotel, needs some maintenance in rooms & illumination to be improved a lot. Staff is fantastic, polite & always ready to help. Overall hotel is good if you can ignore certain flaws then it can be a good place.

They hardly maintained rooms!!The walls ,washrooms,closets, Air-conditioner ,Geyser,TV, nothing was working properly. The hotel didn't have reputation in the town as said by localities and some govt.officers. They don't give any discounts as they promise.. so enquire everything before you check in, service taxes,luxury taxes. Only good thing was they provide good food.
Good option for night halt instead of Delhi. Have good food and tea/coffee options. Adjacent is a branch of Yes Bank and Mahindra, Tata and Renault workshops also.
I liked food of this hotel.room also clean hygiene .fast service always .
